name: Japanese Themed Walking Sim
description:
Just a simple walking sim I made in Uni. I couldn't find the final version so this is an incomplete project. 

I made all the models and textures from scratch using Maya and Photoshop. The environment was assembled in Unity.  I used ShaderForge to create the shaders from scratch.

Unfortunately I couldn't find the files I submitted which contained the read me correctly crediting people who made the sound files. The sounds were all sourced from https://freesound.org/
